# Population [Correlation](Correlation.qmd)
- $$\rho_{xy}= \frac{\sigma_{xy}}{\sigma_{x}\sigma_{y}}$$
- $\sigma$ is the [Standard Deviation](Standard%20Deviation.qmd)
- $\sigma_{xy}$ is the [Covariance](Covariance.qmd)
